channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large cracks forming in wall from street planted tree roots, 16th April
item.description:
Bournside Close, there are a group of 4 trees that are overgrown and have created large cracks to our garden wall - 22 Warden Hill Road, GL51 3AW, due to tree roots. There is also another tree alongside our driveway on Bournside Close that is now leaning towards our property. All these trees belong to the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Bournside Close, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 16th April
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X2 2 METER BARRIERS OUT PLUS X4 SANDBAGS AN PLACE AROUND COLLAPSED SELLER GRATE TO MAKE SAFE (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th April
item.description:

item.title: Extreme danger to pedestrians and cyclists as the new pathway between Bishops Cleeve joins Cleeve Road. The pathway ends and pedestrians have to walk along a narrow stretch of Cleeve Road to get into Gotherington. It is only just inside the 30 limit, there is no verge, the road is narrow and there is a sharp bend. Move the speed limit sign back, make a 20mph section put in rumble strips. Urgent before there is an accident, 16th April
item.description:
Junction of Cleeve Road with new pedestrian/cycle track, as marked on the map. Extreme danger to pedestrians and cyclists as the new pathway between Bishops Cleeve joins Cleeve Road. The pathway ends and pedestrians have to walk along a narrow stretch of Cleeve Road to get into Gotherington. It is only just inside the 30 limit, there is no verge, the road is narrow and there is a sharp bend. Move the speed limit sign back, make a 20mph section put in rumble strips. Urgent before there is an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
